name: The Demon V.0.2.1 *UPDATE*
description:
Welcome to the house of demons >:)

you will need to escape by finding keys and tools to help you escape. make sure to hide from the demon and make sure you are as quiet as possible. dropping objects will set of the demon and will come to the area you dropped it.

Hiding and being caught can cost Double lives.

NOTE THERE MAY BE BUGS.

If you could leave me a tip for my effort that would be amazing :D

More updates will be on the way!

Keybinds:

- Esc To view menu

-Q To exit hiding

-E To interact

-G To drop

-C to crouch
